Reviews.Author: Clancy
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to receive the camera, but the lens cover only completely closes about 10% of the time.  Trying to decide whether to just return and look for another camera or deal with warranty repair/replacement...both will be a hassle and I am disappointed to have to think about this a day after receiving this camera!  The couple of photos and video seem very good...

Reviews.Title: recommended
Reviews.Author: Debrah Little
Reviews.Content: bought this to take along on vacation as a back up camera(always take two) have been using to get accustom to it ahead of time wanted something small and light weight I usually use a NikonD40 but wanted a small purse size . What I have seen so far this little camera packs a big punch takes great photos. Biggest problem I have is I am so use to holding a larger camera it took some getting use to switching to the small one.Arrived packaged nicely and as promised would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6000
Reviews.Author: Heleen
Reviews.Content: First off the seller was terrific.  The item arrived in record time.Best price on the web.  It may be refurbished, but I cannot detect that.  This camera is a great small and easy to use camera.  Very easy to use and small enough to fit in my purse which was my aim. I enjoy shooting wildlife, and with the 5x zoom it makes it easy to get pics of the birds and other wildlife in my area.

Reviews.Title: Quick Shutter and Good Quality
Reviews.Author: SBenjamin "Go Hokies"
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great camera.  The shutter is very quick which I like because I want to catch the picture I am seeing immediately.  The quality of the photos is great too.Only downside is that it can be a little sensitive to a shaky hand.  The pictures can sometimes come out a little blurry if you shake too much and this is worse than some other cameras I have had.

Reviews.Title: pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Gay F. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: the Kool Pic Camera is terrific in several ways.....it is light weight, compact, fits easily in one's pocket, has a great battery, focuses well, and has 7x lens.  The main disadvantage is, depending on the light you can't see what you are taking a picture of.

Reviews.Title: Great performance
Reviews.Author: Fjlocke
Reviews.Content: Amazed what such a small camera can performed with many useful features my previous cameras didn't have. With 14 megapixal quality, I could crop, isolate and enlarge a face to create  8" by 10"  excellent quality portraits. Also, achived excellant Panarama scenic photos with this camera and the Panarama software that came with it.I no longer need my other cameras. The S6000 can do everything and it's as easy as a wallet to carry in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality for this price range
Reviews.Author: Maquiash
Reviews.Content: Takes clear pics, easy to use. Only complain is that it doesn't take a good night pics even with the night mode, but with this price, I can't complain much. I mostly take my 2 year old boy with this camera and it does well enough job.

Reviews.Title: coolpix review
Reviews.Author: Grace L. Miller "Gracie the PB Native"
Reviews.Content: The camera is pretty easy to use. Doesn't have some features I was expecting.Took longer to receive than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: ashishmarwal
Reviews.Content: I simply love the camera. Amazing pictures with superb clarity! Video is great too! I must say that I got much value than the money I paid!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: gslobo
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and the battery last for a long time. I have no complaints about this camera.

Reviews.Title: Geat Product at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: R. Jones
Reviews.Content: We love this camera and Mary loves it so much that I don't even see it anymore or get to use it.  You will be very satisfied with it and I may have to buy another if I can't find where Mary has stashed.  LOL!

Reviews.Title: COOL PIX IS REALLY COOL
Reviews.Author: WHITECAPS
Reviews.Content: This camera has so many advanced features I doubt I will master them all.  You get great results from just the basic settings.  I wish it had a "thumb hold" on the front, you have to be very careful to not let it slip out of your hand.  Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: Saji
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product, real value for money. The pic qualities are amazing and also the video quality, which is superb. The panoramic option is bit difficult to use, also it take some time to save the file. Else everything is great.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT CAMERA !
Reviews.Author: Dance Mat
Reviews.Content: Nikon is a great camera brand, you'll never fail buying any of these cameras. all are perfect !!!! . .

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pics
Reviews.Author: Karucha
Reviews.Content: This camera is awsome. I love the pics it takes. Very nice camera at a very accesible price. I totally recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Lens Error - Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: kettle reviewer
Reviews.Content: Recently received Nikon S6000 as a gift and in less than 2 months, it began to have issues.  Photos and video were blurry and now camera won't turn on and has "lens error".  Called Nikon and I can send it in to them and they will fix it, but they're making me pay to send it in.  I think this is poor customer service - I know it doesn't cost that much to send it in, but I have hardly used the camera and it's already having a problem.  A company should stand behind its product.  I had a Canon camera for the last few years and when it had a problem, Canon sent me a mailing label and I had the camera back in less than 2 weeks.  Go for Canon, not Nikon!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Carol Jones "CJ"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 6 months. At first, it was pretty good. Great pictures. The only major problem was how many seconds on average it would take to shoot several pictures in a row, but I dealt with it.  THEN....the shutter only started 'half way' opening, similar to some of the other reviews. So I decide, I've had it less than 1 year, I'll send it to Nikon for warranty coverage.  Once it got there, Nikon customer service was HORRIBLE. I will never buy another Nikon again. Kodak is better :-(

Reviews.Title: I hoped for so much more...
Reviews.Author: PLR
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace our Sony point and shoot that was outdated. I bought it mostly for taking random, every day pictures of my one-year old daughter. I did not keep the camera long enough to see how well it would take landscape pictures, macro shots, or anything but people shots.There were two very major reasons I returned the camera.1. The flash recharge time was incredibly long. Once I returned it, I tried to compare the recharge times for other cameras but it was difficult to find the right information to accurately compare them. Perhaps the flash recharge speed is on key with the market standard, but it left me missing lots of cute shots of my baby...shots that I could easily capture with my old camera.2. Many of the pictures I took (in several different environments) showed dust orbs like crazy. (looks like little white/somewhat transparent circles on the picture) I know that's common when using a flash on cameras like these, but way too many of my pictures were ruined by the dust orbs.I got a great deal on this camera because I got a nice accessory package pretty much free with it, but it still wasn't worth it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S6000
Reviews.Author: WW
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Nikon S6000 camera today, after reading many favorable reviews. This new Nikon is my second digital camera. My first digital camera was purchased five years ago, a Sony 8 megapixel camera with Carl Zeiss lens.The features of the Nikon S6000 that appealed to me were its size (easily fits into a shirt pocket), resolution (14.2 megapixels), and imaging capability (Nikkor SD lens). I expected this camera to be more advanced than my old camera and for its performance to blow me away. But the images are disappointing, which is to say, viturally unacceptable. They lack the sharpness, resolution, color clarity, and "snap" of the old Sony 8 megapixel camera.  Now I have a choice when I take pictures between a little camera that I can slip into my pocket, or a more bulky old camera with 8 megapixels that takes pictures that are twice as sharp and satifying than those of the little 14.2 megapixel pretender.I wish I had saved my money.

Reviews.Title: i hate this camerea
Reviews.Author: top cat
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE - this is a horrid camera. I have bought many digital cameras and this is the worst camera I have ever owned. I bought this camera close to a year ago for close to $200 and it has never worked right. MY BAD I should have taken it back, but I thought it was my problem, a setting I was putting in wrong or something, finally read other reviews and saw that my problem was the camera problem. My wife has a 4 year old Sony that takes better pictures. I have another Fuji camera that is 3 years old that is better, and it has a broken flash, also I bought an old Cannon on ebay for a paltry $40 that takes better pictures.Trust yourself... it isn't you. It is the camera. Take it back now before the warranty makes you keep it..

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Bell
Reviews.Content: Honestly it is not worth buying this product. For the quality of the images this camera should cost less than $ 100. The pictures always came out blurry. I bought it because of the positive reviews but I returned immediately! Do not buy it, avoid the hassle of dealing with this product.

Reviews.Title: Dissappointing
Reviews.Author: mskitty "mskitty"
Reviews.Content: Very dissappointed in this camera.  It takes very blurred pictures if the subject moves at all.  I expected more from a Nikon, I am giving this one to my 5yr old grandson and going back to Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Did not expect this quality from Nikon
Reviews.Author: Vijay B R
Reviews.Content: Photos taken in any mode (Auto, ISO, Twi;ight, Landscape etc) are bad. Never imagined that the qualoty of the pictures will be so bad.The user experience is the next worst thing.The UI, I feel was designed by some inexperienced. Look at the Sony DSC series for a pleasing UI.Only thing I liked is the HD Video quality.

Reviews.Title: Poor excution of photos
Reviews.Author: mrvids
Reviews.Content: The auto focus does not work well, can't take action photos, even with the proper settings the camera does not work well inside. Find another camera. Very disappointed in this one.

Reviews.Title: Died within a few months of use.
Reviews.Author: J. Buchholz
Reviews.Content: I'd only used this camera for a few months, when it died while I was taking pictures one day.I was simply holding it, snapping away when a poof of smoke came out of it and spiraled upwards, and then it just turned itself off.Considering my old Nikon coolpix only lasted 2 years and then gave up the ghost I was really miffed that I had now spent over $400 on these things and neither were of any decent quality.I even had a case for this one!

Reviews.Title: check it out
Reviews.Author: jecsr34
Reviews.Content: I like it very much, sharp, easy to use.P. S. Still looking witch card & case to get for it.John E. Clements

Reviews.Title: A Marvel
Reviews.Author: Shouvanik
Reviews.Content: The  product is a marvel of its kind. In such a small budget, getting a high end camera is like beyond imagination. The ease with which it takes photos makes it a child gadget. I bought it for my cousin. He will be surely overjoyed. Nikon has always proved to be the No. 1 in the camera market.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, just too small for me.
Reviews.Author: dazie
Reviews.Content: Growing up with Film cameras then moving to my Kodak Easyshare CX-7530 im used to a camera you can hold onto and have it have some weight to it. I know some others like the ones you can stick in your back pocket and just quickly grab it and shoot. (i'm getting there) So out of the box the Nikon S6000 was packed nicely, but the camera even tho I knew the dimensions, looked just too small for what I felt I wanted.  I did snap a couple of pictures and the picture color and quality compared to what I had been taking with my 5MP camera was immediately noticed.  This cameara did take some nice colorful shots.The little accessory cover on the side which covers the USB / and A/V out seemed to be flimsy and like it could easily break off, it was only held on by one small rubber piece and it sort of swung down to open.  The battery cover worked but seemed really lightweight, the whole camera is not heavy at all.The screen was nice and colorful, I didn't play with it a lot b/c I knew i wanted to return it once I saw the size and felt the weight, but it was clear and bright.I think for someone who wants a small lightweight camera this will definitely work for you, for those who want a camera with a bit more heft, then look at some other models.Good Buy if a small point and shoot is what you are looking for !

Reviews.Title: Nikon S6000 Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Gail Hunter
Reviews.Content: Very good, but I should have paid more for more zoom power. Could have a stronger case. Suggest buying a good carrying case. Otherwise, lens is usual Nikon quality - great.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality
Reviews.Author: Doreen Sosa-saney
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything i expected of it and more.. i bought it for my girlfriend on her birthday and she absolutely loves it as well..

Reviews.Title: Avoid Like The Plague
Reviews.Author: M&L; Mama
Reviews.Content: Fresh out of the box, this camera didn't operate as promised. Lag time between photos was ridiculously long and shutter responsiveness was also extremely disappointing. I know how to play with shooting modes and none could capture my active toddler. When the lens cover also malfunctioned it went into the shop (at my mailing expense.) After a month it was finally returned--still unresponsive and now the internal menu options were messed up (ability to change megapixel resolution was no longer available!) To top it off, the camera didn't even turn on reliably. I have to dig my fingernail into power button up to 7 times before it will turn on and it regularly flips off before I can even take a shot. Customer service was apologetic but refused to go "off script" to make the executive decision to replace my camera. Instead I am without my camera AGAIN while it gets another trip to the Nikon repair shop. I missed taking photos of Baby's Christmas while Nikon attempted to repair a camera that they had in their shop just a month ago. If you want a trust-worthy device to capture your family memories...avoid the Nikon S6000 like the plague.

Reviews.Title: Bad Pictures
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Dietz "joedietz"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera from Best Buy.  Ours actually came in a kit along with a carrying case and a memory card.  After one week we returned the camera.We took about 100-200 pictures on the camera and we just did not really like the pictures it took.  Pictures were blurry, pictures were soft, terrible with action shots.  It did not have a "sports" or "action" setting like most cameras that I have owned.  Also there was a delay from when you pressed the button until it actually took your picture.  We have two little girls that move a lot and trying to catch smiles or other actions would not work with this delay.  Overall we just didn't like the pictures.The kit is silly as well.  The case is nice, but the storage card that they include is not adequate.  In the owners manual for the camera they recommend a Class 6 card in order for the HD movie taking to work properly, the card that comes with the kit is Class 4.We ended up buying the Panasonic ZR3 and it is a great camera so far!

Reviews.Title: Very sleek and attractive camera
Reviews.Author: Engelbert
Reviews.Content: The Nikon S6000 is a very compact and user friendly camera. Unfortunately it may take a few times before you can capture a clear shot but other than that issue, I see this camera as great point and shoot device.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: T-Way "T-Way"
Reviews.Content: Ordered with ease, Arrived on time estimated, and as shown, I dont like being required to put in a certain amount of words for review!!!

Reviews.Title: Travel Camera
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon camera, the point and shoot type.  It is an excellent camera and the only thing that is lacking is it not having a view finder.  However since it was a gift and it was picked out by me, I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Review
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Jaime Vasquez Mejia (V000179)
Reviews.Content: I expected more from this camera. I will not say it's bad but it doesn`t respond as fast as others in its category and the battery is a nightmare: it has low duration.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Omar1318
Reviews.Content: Hi,I'm new with Digital Cameras but I really loved this one. It is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: service not good
Reviews.Author: cleo
Reviews.Content: the camera arrived in a crumpled box.  I had a feeling it had been used although it was in new packages but the box was so worn out... Also, it was my understanding that the memory card would be in the order... it was not.  The shipper said that part of the order would come later... it never did.  Now I have to order the memory card separately.  If it was not part of the order, it should have been clarified earlier.  Worst of all, the price of this camera at Costco was so much better... I feel that I spent my money in vain.

Reviews.Title: Carefull about high resolution video
Reviews.Author: carlosthunder
Reviews.Content: the high resolution video is .MOV so if you want to run it in your computer you have to install quick-time which make your computer slow.  Picture is not very good lots of shades.  STILL nikon-coolpix is a very good brand this ONE is not.

Reviews.Title: Broke after one week
Reviews.Author: Rebekah M. Green
Reviews.Content: We owned the camera for one week and it broke.  The dial that turns the flash on or off stopped working and the camera was stuck with the flash off.  Luckily we bought from Costco and they have a great return policy. We are disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, though somehow missed something
Reviews.Author: Low Ye Wei
Reviews.Content: I tried it a few times and like it a lot with the features and I believe that is really great deal when I buy (during sales though)I like zoom and I like the pictures it took. Clear and nice, but as some reviews that the picture look blue in PC, but really, I have too little photo taken to 100% claim how bad it is.It come with a battery, maybe I did not fully charged it before, it die after like 30 2nd high quality photo + 15~20sec video.What I don't feel good enough is it won't get clear image if I moved while taking picture. Of course not a little hand shake, but sometimes it screw up the picture quality.The camera is easy to use, I can soon figure out how to use some basic function and operation without looking at the menu. ( I don't use digital camera much before and the last one is like one in museum.  )I will recommend this if someone looking for 14mp 7x op camera with such price range. But if someone looking for better, this is not the perfect choice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - easy to use
Reviews.Author: D. Kenney
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Very easy to use. Picture quality is excellent. I currently have a 10MP Canon and bought this one for my wife. It's so much better than the one I have, I am trading up and getting one of these. :)

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: annieoftirol
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera refurbished by Nikon from the Nikon store. The usb port did not work from the get go, the camera would not charge, either via ac adapter or via usb cable to laptop. Luckily the battery that came with it was fully charged so I had a chance to check it out until the battery wore down. It turns out you can't use the camera if the usb cable is plugged in, you have to buy a special seperate, expensive adapter if you want to use the camera while the battery is charging. If you don't, be prepared to buy a lot of extra proprietary batteries for when you travel. It seems everything on this camera is propietary, my old camera used AA batteries which I bought in the store wherever I went, no problems. The worst with this purchase was Nikon customer service. Completely outsourced and completely useless. I told them the camera was defective and that I wanted to return it, they insisted I pay for return shipping, even though the camera came with a 90 day warranty. On two calls, the rep put me on hold and never returned  to the call. Nikon ought to do better than that, how about some local,competent and consumer friendly customer service. I returned the camera at my own expense. Good riddance.

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: Kish
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera in March. Got the product on time, product was brand new out of the box and works great. Hope to buy more products from you in the future

Reviews.Title: Difficult to focus
Reviews.Author: Henry Tsao
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on the various positive reviews I read concerning this camera.  I got this camera from Amazon and it was very easy to use from the start.  I started using it straight out of the box without needing to read too much instructions.  The picture quality is average especially indoors.  The flash did not have a lot of range.  The picture quality and clarity improved once we were outdoor.  To be quite honest, I was not disappointed as this was a point and shoot camera costing only about $140.  My biggest disappointment, however, was that in many situations (espcially indoors), the auto focus will not focus.  As a result, no picture will be taken despite how long or how hard I press the shutter button.  I have had cameras where it took a few milliseconds to auto focus on the image.  However, I never had a camera where it just never auto focus and I could not take a picture.  Thanks to Amazon I was able to return this camera with full credit.

Reviews.Title: decent DC
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: it is quite good for the prize,although sometimes i'm not 100% satisfied with the pic quality when compare to $800 ones..well,it is sillyanyway,i give it a five-star

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Suzy K
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera! I got it for my birthday in May and have been using it nonstop. Takes great pictures. Very nice and small, easy to use. I got it because it did not have a million buttons that I had no clue what they did.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures until it shuts off a minute into using it, but its small & convenient i guess..... Only one major problem.
Reviews.Author: NotAvailable "kp072"
Reviews.Content: I'd like to use it, the only problem.... It constantly shuts off in the middle of viewing pictures taking pictures, anything you do it shuts off. I bought it new... Its not that I didn't charge it either. It was fully charged and still shutting itself off constantly.3 months into having it, I can no longer use it because I turn the power on and it shuts down immediately after turning on. Not satisfied at all. I paid way too much to only have a camera for 2 1/2 months.

Reviews.Title: worked beautifully for ALMOST 3 WEEKS!
Reviews.Author: N. K. Hersh
Reviews.Content: Stopped turning on...when I turned it over to read the serial number (required to return it for service after 3 weeks), why was I not surprised to read "MADE IN CHINA"?This is junk, plain and simple

Reviews.Title: This is one of the worst cameras I purchased
Reviews.Author: S. Haund
Reviews.Content: This is a camera to avoid.I ended up returning it after it proved useless to take photos.Reasons -QUALITY - for 14mp  - the pictures are not very good. when I zoom on a pic a little, I see pixels.  I had a 5mp that took far better pics.Many times it took long time to decide to take a photo. I missed many photos I wanted to take.I was trying to take outside portraits and it would take so long to take a pic sometimes they the subjects thought I had taken many pics, and would walk away. ( they see me pressing the take picture button many times)Manual is incomplete. Did not explain some details, like what was the difference between the two same resolutions - one with a star next it and the one with no star.4320x3240*  and4320x3240The white balance it incredibly slow, poor.  Many times, I would be taking pics outside, and turn camera off subject for few seconds, and then point camera back and the previes screen is all white , like I had pointed it at the son. It would take an unacceptable amount of time to adjust to the "new " lighting conditions.The auto flash can be retarded at times. (even when my fingers do not cover up the poorly placed light sensor and flash. ) Many times the flash would go off on clear sunny days.The flash can take a while to recycle, then another picture can be taken.The color balance is poor. I would take pics and the colors would be off .I have used other Nikon's, Canon and Kodak cameras before, and this is the worst one I have ever used. Yet its specs were the "best"Camera takes poor motion pictures . The ones where the subject is moving while the picture is taken.Battery life is not very long when taking pics.Charging jack on the bottom of camera a little awkward to get to.Menus did not come up consistently during use. Frequently I had to "fight " with the camera to get if to pull up the correct menu.The auto scene selector would not pick the correct scene type most of the time.Microphone on video recordings was very poor quality , and seemed to be placed where your hand holds camera on left to stabilize while using cameraI think idiots designed this camera.  Way to go Nikon.And having Nikon customer service tell me that I must buy a $1000 camera to take photos is an insult, when I know a crappy product then I use one.

Reviews.Title: Not a must have camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ram Manohar Lohi Darisa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just because I needed a date/time stamp on the picture and none of Sony cameras has that feature. I would not recommend this product to anyone unless you are a moron and do not know anything about a camera.
